feed.title: Baby Buddy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Baby Buddy: v2.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed? DST!

  • fix: Ensure child ID is included in exports by @cdubz in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/873
  • Re-implement homeassistant ingress-server middleware by @MrApplejuice in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/852
  • fix: Timeline navigation buttons not clickable at certain screen sizes by @oelegeirnaert in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/871
  • fix: Correct colspan for empty feeding list page in 31db7ef
  • fix: Calculate durations in UTC in 9392d09 (#891, #572)
  • fix: Convert to localtime when doing date math in c20a6de (#893, #892, #890, #792)
  • fix: Save bottle feeding many-to-many relations in 5ba7fdb (#880)
  • fix: Correct note colspans in 14a1565 (#888)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/compare/v2.6.0...v2.6.1

Small adjustment to attempt to unblock OttPeterR/addon-babybuddy/pull/73.

entry.title: New release for Baby Buddy: v2.6.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: #865 remove Timezone flag from documentation by @laingcc in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/897
  • Fix SUB_PATH breakage caused by the new home assistant middleware by @MrApplejuice in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/899

New Contributors

  • @laingcc made their first contribution in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/897

Full Changelog: https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/compare/v2.6.2...v2.6.3

entry.title: New release for Baby Buddy: v2.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Update zh-Hans translation by @huangyq23 in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/903
  • fix: AttributeError caused by Home Assistant middleware. by @SeraphimRP in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/908
  • feat: Serbian language support by @laxsrbija in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/906
  • fix: Display "float" values as entered by @cdubz in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/915

New Contributors

  • @huangyq23 made their first contribution in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/903
  • @SeraphimRP made their first contribution in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/908
  • @laxsrbija made their first contribution in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/906

Full Changelog: https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/compare/v2.6.3...v2.7.0

entry.title: New release for Baby Buddy: v2.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enable better numerical input on mobile devices by @huangyq23 in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/919
  • Fix database url configuration option not functional by @Thor77 in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/934
  • fix: weight and height percentile plotting error due to date range by @jpzheng in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/933

New Contributors

  • @Thor77 made their first contribution in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/934
  • @jpzheng made their first contribution in https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/pull/933

Full Changelog: https://github.com/babybuddy/babybuddy/compare/v2.7.0...v2.7.1
